volumeInsights.title: Significant Hiring Increase
volumeInsights.description: 522% increase in postings compared to the previous period.

volumeInsights.title: Total Postings
volumeInsights.description: 927 total job postings in this period.

competitiveInsights.title: Market Presence
competitiveInsights.description: 24.9% of total UN system job postings.

competitiveInsights.title: Market Ranking
competitiveInsights.description: Ranked #1 out of 29 agencies by hiring volume.

competitiveInsights.title: Above Peer Average
competitiveInsights.description: Hiring volume exceeds peer group (Large Operational Agencies) average.

strategicInsights.title: Top Location
strategicInsights.description: New York is the primary duty station with 12% of positions.

recommendations.rationale: 56% of positions are consultants, which may impact institutional knowledge.
recommendations.impact: Better knowledge retention and reduced turnover

recommendations.rationale: Only 5% of positions are at senior level.
recommendations.impact: Stronger succession planning and organizational capability
